/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, giving a sense of the city's towering buildings and busy traffic. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a stark contrast to the urban landscape below. Buildings of various sizes and designs line the street, their facades hinting at the architectural diversity of the city. Cars and trucks, painted in a palette of blues, whites, and reds, traverse the road, adding a dynamic element to the scene. The sun shines brightly overhead, casting long shadows and illuminating the scene with a warm glow.
